metadata.title: Week 1 Day 2: Introduction to Latin Nouns

prior_knowledge_digest: Students should be familiar with the basic structure of Latin as an inflected language, where word endings change to convey meaning. They should understand the concept of nouns and have a basic grasp of English grammar, including subjects and objects. Familiarity with the idea of gender in language, as seen in languages like Spanish or French, will be helpful. Students should also recall the Latin alphabet and pronunciation rules introduced in Day 1.
yesterday_recap: Yesterday, we introduced the Latin alphabet and pronunciation rules. Students practiced pronouncing simple Latin words and learned about the importance of inflection in Latin.

primary: Identify and classify Latin nouns by gender
Understand and apply basic noun endings

lesson_flow.description: Review the Latin alphabet and pronunciation rules from Day 1.
lesson_flow.student_action: Students recite the alphabet and practice pronunciation.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Focus on vowel sounds and common pronunciation errors.

lesson_flow.description: Introduce Latin nouns and the concept of gender (masculine, feminine, neuter).
lesson_flow.student_action: Listen and take notes on noun gender and examples.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Use examples from familiar languages to illustrate gender.

lesson_flow.description: Practice identifying noun genders using a list of common Latin nouns.
lesson_flow.student_action: Work in pairs to classify nouns by gender.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Provide immediate feedback and correct misconceptions.

lesson_flow.description: Students complete a worksheet classifying nouns and applying correct endings.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Circulate to offer help and ensure understanding.

lesson_flow.description: Recap the day's lesson and preview the next topic.
lesson_flow.student_action: Participate in a brief Q&A session.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Encourage questions and highlight the importance of noun endings.

lesson_flow.description: Discuss the virtue of patience in learning a new language.
lesson_flow.student_action: Reflect on how patience helps in language learning.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Connect the faith phrase to the day's learning experience.
